summary: Non-Profit Executive Director with over 15 years of progressive experience in non-profit management, grant-writing, fundraising, development, public relations, and marketing.

experience.title: Executive Director
experience.description: Providing overall management of the legislatively mandated Early Learning Coalition; working with the Board of Directors to develop and implement the agency's strategic visions; financial management of a $6 million annual budget; directing funding aligned with Board policy; oversight of service delivery; fundraising and managing relationships with funding sources; marketing and public relations; overseeing resource allocation; advocacy with local agencies, media, and government; supervising staff of 16; contracts and compliance; strategic plan implementation; staff development and succession planning; promoting teamwork, accountability, and transparency.

experience.title: Public Relations Officer
experience.description: Served as press/media contact for museum activities; developed PR plan and budget; promotional/advertising strategy; increased attendance; produced publications; planned and implemented special events and fund-raising events; managed facility rentals; supervised group tour coordinator, development interns and volunteers.

experience.title: Coordinator of Community Relations
experience.description: Public relations, education, marketing and development for a non-profit hospice in-home services; promoted hospice awareness; developed annual agency marketing plan and materials; planned events; wrote grants; developed in-service education; recruited and supervised volunteers; liaison with medical referral base and community; interdisciplinary team involvement.

experience.title: Program Development Specialist
experience.description: Developed and supervised programs for the elderly across seven counties; public speaking, training, grant writing, budgeting, and contract development; monitored service providers; liaison with State Division of Aging; edited agency newspaper; developed PR campaigns; statewide educational project on alcohol abuse/drug misuse in the elderly.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science, Social and Rehabilitation Services

certifications: Certified Trainer, Bridges Out of Poverty
Certified Facilitator, Getting Ahead in a Just Getting By World
